text: Yes Man is a 2008 American British romantic comedy movie directed by Peyton Reed and is based loosely on the 2005 memoir of the same name by Danny Wallace. It stars Jim Carrey, Zooey Deschanel, Bradley Cooper, John Michael Higgins, Rhys Darby, Danny Masterson, Terence Stamp and was distributed by Warner Bros. Pictures. It was a box office success. == Other websites == * * Category:2008 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:British romantic comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Peyton Reed Category:Warner Bros. movies
title: Yes Man (movie)
